p: 1 mL solution of extracts/fractions were acidified with 10% dilute acetic acid in two separate test tubes.[ 15] To the first test tube few drops of freshly prepared Mayer’s reagent were added, whereas to the second test tube few drops of Dragendorff’s reagent were added. The appearance of cream-colored precipitates with Mayer’s reagent or reddish-brown precipitate with Dragendorff’s reagent confirmed the presence of alkaloids.[ 14]
